definition: A result or outcome obtained from a process, calculation, or event. It is commonly used in various contexts, such as scientific research, sports, business, or any situation where the end product or consequence is being referred to.

examples.german: Das Ergebnis der Prüfung war sehr gut.
examples.english: The result of the exam was very good.

examples.german: Das ist das Ergebnis unserer Bemühungen.
examples.english: This is the result of our efforts.

examples.german: Das Ergebnis der Wahl wird bald bekannt gegeben.
examples.english: The result of the election will be announced soon.

examples.german: Das Ergebnis der Studie ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The result of the study is impressive.
